body_html: Arrays are zero-based, which means the first array element has index 0, and not 1, thus the last index of an 18 element array is 17, and not 18. Maybe your indexing system is for a one-based array. Try subtracting 1 to the indexing variable.
body_text: Arrays are zero-based, which means the first array element has index 0, and not 1, thus the last index of an 18 element array is 17, and not 18. Maybe your indexing system is for a one-based array. Try subtracting 1 to the indexing variable.
body: Arrays are zero-based, which means the first array element has index 0, and not 1, thus the last index of an 18 element array is 17, and not 18. Maybe your indexing system is for a one-based array. Try subtracting 1 to the indexing variable.
